text: The International Day of Action for Women's Health is an international observance celebrated on May 28 every year since 1987. ==See also== * International Day for the Elimination of Violence against Women * International Women's Day * Menstrual Hygiene Day (May 28) ==References== ==External links== * May 28 | International Day of Action for Women's Health * Campaigns | WGNRR Category:Feminism and health Category:May observances Category:Civil awareness days Category:Recurring events established in 1987 Category:Women's events
title: International Day of Action for Women's Health
